alert.note: Alert for Bayamon (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:17PM AST until January 11 at 10:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR BAYAMON COUNTY... At 817 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring, requiring multiple rescue efforts. Flood waters affecting roads and houses, with multiple families and pets trapped along the Lomas Verdes Avenue and surrounding areas. Some roads remain affected or impassable due to flood waters and mudslides, particularly road PR-830. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and 911 reports. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
